attributes.action: Make all sweets in the U.K 50p (apart from the ones already under 50p)
attributes.additional_details: Because kids love sweets and these days they're too expensive.
attributes.background: I want you to make all sweets in the U.K in every shop 50p because kids want sweets and yeah. Also if there are sweets under 50p keep them all the same.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the price of sweets are a matter for manufacturers and retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
